info.title: Safe Practices
info.description: This module educates users about essential cybersecurity practices, real-world examples, and strategies to recognize and prevent potential threats.

pages.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity Safe Practices
pages.content: Cybersecurity safe practices are essential measures and behaviors that individuals and organizations adopt to protect their digital assets from cyber threats. These practices help prevent unauthorized access, data breaches, and other malicious activities.
